statements: UPDATE wallet_balances SET balance = 150.75, last_updated = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123 AND cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
UPDATE wallet_balances SET cryptocurrency = 'Ethereum' WHERE user_id = 456 AND balance < 1000.00;
